title: Growing and harvesting large quantities of onions - Advanced agricultural techniques

tasks.task: Planting onion seeds or bulbs in the fields
subtasks: Soaking seeds in warm water for 12-24 hours
Treating seeds for germination rate and pest resistance
Choosing suitable soil (loose, well-drained, rich in organic matter)
Sowing seeds or planting onion bulbs in arranged rows
Watering the planted area using drip irrigation
Regularly weeding to prevent nutrient competition
Checking for signs of maturity (tops falling over)
Carefully lifting onions to avoid damage
Sorting onions by size and quality
Note on chemical purchases and ratings
Mention of Amazon and shipping Canada
Encouragement to subsribe and hit notification bell

tasks.task: ** Planting onion seeds or bulbs in the fields
